verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>letter<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> which were carried away <S%H1473>captives<s%>, and to the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and to the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> whom <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>;

<S%H310>(After<s%> that <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and the <S%H1377>queen<s%>, and the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%>, the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and the <S%H2796>carpenters<s%>, and the <S%H4525>smiths<s%>, were <S%H3318>departed<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>;)

By the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H501>Elasah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%>, and <S%H1587>Gemariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, (whom <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>) <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto all that are carried away <S%H1473>captives<s%>, whom I have caused to be carried <S%H1540>away<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto <S%H894>Babylon<s%>;
<S%H1129>Build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H5193>them<s%>; and plant <S%H1593>gardens<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> the fruit of <S%H6529>them<s%>;

<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>, and <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> for your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H582>husbands<s%>, that they may <S%H3205>carry<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1121>daughters<s%>; that you may be <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H4591>there<s%>, and not diminished.

And <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> where I have caused you to be carried away <S%H1540>captives<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for <S%H7965>it<s%>: for in the peace there shall you have <S%H7965>peace<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; Let not your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and your <S%H7080>diviners<s%>, that be in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H5377>you<s%>, deceive <S%H8085>you<s%>, neither listen to your <S%H2472>dreams<s%> which you cause to be <S%H2492>dreamed<s%>.
For they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> unto you in my <S%H8034>name<s%>: I have not <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5002>them<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, That <S%H6310>after<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> be <S%H4390>accomplished<s%> at <S%H894>Babylon<s%> I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H6965>you<s%>, and perform my <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> toward <S%H7725>you<s%>, in causing you to return to this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> that I <S%H2803>think<s%> toward <S%H5002>you<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and not of <S%H7451>evil<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H8615>expected<s%> <S%H319>end<s%>.
Then shall you <S%H7121>call<s%> upon <S%H1980>me<s%>, and you shall go and <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, and I will listen unto you.
And you shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4672>me<s%>, and find <S%H1875>me<s%>, when you shall search for me with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

And I will be <S%H4672>found<s%> of <S%H5002>you<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and I will turn <S%H7725>away<s%> your <S%H7622>captivity<s%>, and I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and from all the <S%H4725>places<s%> where I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H5002>you<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and I will bring you <S%H7725>again<s%> into the <S%H4725>place<s%> from where I caused you to be carried away <S%H1540>captive<s%>.
Because you have <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has raised us <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> in <S%H894>Babylon<s%>;

Know that thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> that <S%H3427>sits<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%>, and of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> that are not gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> with you into <S%H1473>captivity<s%>;

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; <S%H7971>Behold<s%>, I will send upon them the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, and will <S%H5414>make<s%> them like <S%H8182>vile<s%> <S%H8384>figs<s%>, that cannot be <S%H398>eaten<s%>, they are so <S%H7455>evil<s%>.

And I will <S%H7291>persecute<s%> <S%H310>them<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, with the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and with the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, and will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them to be <S%H2189>removed<s%> to all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, to be a <S%H423>curse<s%>, and a <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, and a <S%H8322>hissing<s%>, and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%>, among all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> where I have driven <S%H5080>them<s%>:

Because they have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to my <S%H1697>words<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which I <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto them by my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> <S%H8085>them<s%>; but you would not hear, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> you therefore the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, all you of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, whom I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6964>Kolaiah<s%>, and of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%>, which <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> unto you in my <S%H8034>name<s%>; <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I will deliver them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; and he shall <S%H5221>kill<s%> them before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>;

And of them shall be taken <S%H3947>up<s%> a <S%H7045>curse<s%> by all the <S%H1546>captivity<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> which are in <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> you like <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> and like <S%H256>Ahab<s%>, whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7033>roasted<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>;

Because they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H5039>villany<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with their <S%H7453>neighbors<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>, and have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in my <S%H8034>name<s%>, which I have not <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3045>them<s%>; even I know, and am a <S%H5707>witness<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Thus shall you also <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>speaks<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Because you have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> in your <S%H8034>name<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and to <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and to all the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H3548>priest<s%> in the place of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, that you should be <S%H6496>officers<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, for every <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H7696>mad<s%>, and makes himself a <S%H5012>prophet<s%>, that you should <S%H5414>put<s%> him in <S%H4115>prison<s%>, and in the <S%H6729>stocks<s%>.
Now <S%H1605>therefore<s%>, why have you not reproved <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> of <S%H6069>Anathoth<s%>, which makes himself a prophet to <S%H5012>you<s%>?

For therefore he <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto us in <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H1931>This<s%> captivity is <S%H752>long<s%>: <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H5193>them<s%>; and plant <S%H1593>gardens<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> the fruit of <S%H6529>them<s%>.
And <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> this <S%H5612>letter<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>.
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H7971>Send<s%> to all them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> concerning <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite<s%>; Because that <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> has <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> unto <S%H7971>you<s%>, and I sent him <S%H982>not<s%>, and he caused you to trust in a <S%H8267>lie<s%>:

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H6485>Behold<s%>, I will punish <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite<s%>, and his <S%H2233>seed<s%>: he shall not have a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>; neither shall he <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> that I will <S%H6213>do<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; because he has <S%H1696>taught<s%> <S%H5627>rebellion<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
